scripts.start: gulp css && concurrently --kill-others --handle-input "cd theme && vtex link" "gulp watch" -n "vtex,gulp" -c "magenta,cyan"
scripts.checkout: gulp css && concurrently --kill-others --handle-input "cd checkout-ui-settings && vtex link" "gulp watch" -n "vtex,gulp" -c "magenta,cyan"
scripts.vrm: cd theme && vtex release minor stable
scripts.vrp: cd theme && vtex release patch stable
scripts.vprom: cd theme && vtex workspace create prod --production && vtex use prod && vtex install && vtex promote
scripts.vtex:init: yarn vtex:init:apps && yarn vtex:custom:apps && yarn gulp:create:css
scripts.vtex:init:apps: vtex use master && vtex install vtex.admin-search && vtex install vtex.search-resolver
scripts.vtex:custom:apps: vtex install vtexeurope.minicart-freeshipping-bar@1.x && vtex install vtex.wish-list@1.x && vtex install vtex.reviews-and-ratings
